item.description:
Let's get together at Panera Bread in Warwick for coffee and chat on a Wednesday night. Perhaps bring your cribbage board and some cards (or your favorite board game) and have more fun than sitting in front of the boob tube! It will allow us to take a mid-week break to meet and socialize in a quieter atmosphere. Maybe we can discuss and plan future events for the group. Anyone for picnics, volleyball, etc.? Bring your ideas, and I will bring a notebook!

Panera is open until 9:30pm. Feel free to stop in and leave as your schedule permits. Possibly have dinner there too.

This location is in the plaza just south of the Showcase Cinema on Route 2, Warwick.

---------------------------------------

Please let me know if another night would be better for this meetup. I have posted a poll (under the "More" > Polls tab above) - only one response in the past week.
item.how_to_find_us: Will have a Meetup sign on the table.

group.name: Mingle with singles 45+ Socializing and dancing

item.name: Informal Coffee Meet 6:00-9:00 PM Wednesday - Panera Bread, Warwick
